did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell AIDS Action records, 1987-1996.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Records of the Sexuality and AIDS educator (1987-1990) and Coordinator of Cornell AIDS Action (1990-1992), Sharon J. Dittman. Includes records of the CU AIDS Advisory Committee (1991-1992); training, workshop, and resource materials from Cornell AIDS Action and SAFER (Students for AIDS Facts Education and Responsibility); clippings on sexuality, religion, and other topics; also, educational videos on AIDS and sexuality.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records of the Sexuality and AIDS educator (1987-1990) and Coordinator of Cornell AIDS Action (1990-1992), Sharon J. Dittman. Includes records of the CU AIDS Advisory Committee (1991-1992); training, workshop, and resource materials from Cornell AIDS Action and SAFER (Students for AIDS Facts Education and Responsibility); clippings on sexuality, religion, and other topics; also, educational videos on AIDS and sexuality.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University.SAFER (Students for AIDS Facts Education and Responsibility).

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell AIDS Action records, #51-1-2746. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collection: Cornell Biology and Society 451, "AIDS and Society," scrapbooks, #21-44-3298.

Cornell University, materials from World AIDS Day and the AIDS Memorial Quilt display at Cornell University. Items include: "The AIDS Memorial Quilt, WSH Memorial Room" poster, 2 hand-made posters for World Aids Day 1996, 4 posters of HIV/AIDS statistics and information, 1 "Fight AIDS" poster, an "AIDS Affects All" poster produced by the International Students and Scholars Office at Cornell (multilingual) and materials from the creation of the poster, a "Please Be Aware Some Posters Contain Nude Images" sign, a "Let's talk about love God's Way" paper, and papers containing comments from students and staff about the World AIDS Day poster display. Also AIDS memorial quilt 2000 materials and schedules and Names Quilt 1996 material.
